name: Armchair Communist
description:
Armchair Communist

Welcome to Armchair Communist, a simple/retro/bad text-based game which allows you to take control of one of five dictatorships in search of great military conquest! Keep your people fed and happy, and they will in turn fight for your glorious empire!

Currently a very simple Proof Of Concept with very little substance outside of the main ideas and lots of bugs... but a I'm a sad 14-year-old and any self-validation you can offer in the comments really feels warm and fuzzy inside :-)
